content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ the **mosaic ridge crochet hat** is worked from the brim up incorporating the same captivating mosaic stitch pattern as the mosaic ridge sweater it s perfect for gifting or keeping and once you start you ll find yourself wanting to make one for the whole family with its cozy fit and charming design this matching set creates a cohesive look making it perfect for chilly weather or as a thoughtful handmade gift the best crochet collection for fall is here i ve teamed up with my friends mj s off the hook designs and hanjan crochet for this exciting event the collection features 6 stunning patterns including mosaic garments and hats sign up for the crochet-along to receive a special coupon code and supply list don t miss out this collection is only available for a limited time and is currently over 50% off click here to get the collection 1 get this pattern in a kit on mary maxim 2 this hat pattern comes with a video tutorial https //youtu be/slulich_kp0 crochet hook g & h 4 0 & 5 0mm 3 - or size to meet gauge notions removable stitch markers 4 yarn needle to weave in ends 5 scissors 6 pompom 7 yarn mary maxim mellowspun 8 100% acrylic 284yds/100g mary maxim prism 9 100% acrylic 290yds/100g yardage total yardage between 90-230yds newborn 90 yds baby 100 yds toddler 150 yds child 190 yds adult 215 yds large adult 230 yds the quantities of yarn between color a & color b will vary depending on which is chosen for the brim but each hat would only require one ball of each color yarn substitutions wecrochet swish 10 100% fine superwash merino wool 110yds/50g premier basix dk yarn 11 100% acrylic 306yds/100g premier colorfusion dk yarn 12 100% acrylic 325yds/100g abbreviations blo - back loop only chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet ehdc - extended half_double_crochet ehdc2tog - extended half_double_crochet two together round - round single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es gauge not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 13 sizes newborn baby toddler child/small adult adult large adult to fit head circumference newborn 13-14 33-36 cm baby 16-17 41-43 cm toddler 18-19 46-48 cm child/small adult 20-21 51-53 cm adult 22-23 56-58 cm large adult 24-25 61-64 cm skill level intermediate let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 14 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 15 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 16 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 17 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 18 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 19 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2024 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved
